page.heading: Our Services
page.description: Comprehensive cybersecurity solutions designed to protect your organization against evolving threats and ensure regulatory compliance.

list.title: vCISO & Information Security Leadership
list.description: Gain access to senior cybersecurity leadership without hiring full-time. Our vCISO service delivers security governance, regulatory guidance, and strategic risk insights.
details: Executive and Board presentations on security
Periodic review and updates of security practices

list.title: Cyber Security Maturity Assessment
list.description: Understand your organization’s current cybersecurity posture and build a structured roadmap for improvement against global standards.
details: Identify gaps and areas for improvements

list.title: Cloud Security
list.description: Strengthen and optimize cloud environments across AWS, Azure, GCP, and hybrid setups with configuration reviews and access controls.
details: Roadmap to manage cloud security risks

list.title: Data Security
list.description: Protect your critical assets with data loss prevention, access management, and robust encryption policies.
details: Identify controls to secure company's assets
Data Loss Prevention (DLP) to prevent unauthorized data transfers

list.title: Governance Risk and Compliance (GRC)
list.description: Comprehensive risk management and compliance services including ISO certification consulting and regulatory guidance.
details: Risk management - Assess, accept, transfer, remediate
Guidance for SOC 1&2 attestation and audits
Compliance review with industry standards (ISO, NIST, PCI DSS, GDPR)
Supply Chain and Third Party Risk Assessments

list.title: Managed Security Operations Center (SOC)
list.description: A 24×7 next-generation SOC combining AI, ML, and advanced analytics to detect, analyze, and respond to cybersecurity threats in real time.
details: ML and AI on Big/Fast data architecture
Integrated solution for compliance and use cases
Flexible billing by devices, not EPS

list.title: Vulnerability Assessment (VAPT)
list.description: Identify and remediate vulnerabilities with expert penetration testing, red team assessments, and breach simulations.
details: End to end management of vulnerability management programs
Mobile App, API, AI, CI/CD Assessments

list.title: Cyber Warriors on Premises
list.description: Augment your team with trained cybersecurity experts for on-site support, threat monitoring, and specialized solutions.
details: Trained cyber security resources to augment teams
Broad spectrum of services with multiple skill sets
Threat Monitoring & Dark Web Monitoring Experts
Skill Enhancement Programs for team development
